topic_description: Travel research applies AI to itinerary planning, destination recommendation, price prediction, tourist experience optimization, and travel behavior analysis. This field explores personalized recommendation systems, natural language processing for travel reviews, computer vision for landmark recognition, and methods for understanding traveler preferences. Researchers develop techniques for creating customized travel suggestions, predicting travel trends, optimizing trip logistics, and building systems that help travelers discover destinations and experiences matching their interests and constraints.
